title: Highest Binding Coverage for Primary Products
description: In 2022, Grenada achieved a 100% binding coverage for primary products, indicating a strong commitment to trade agreements and tariff bindings.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received as a Percentage of GNI
description: Grenada recorded a negative net ODA received at -8.19% of its GNI in 2022, highlighting a minimal reliance on foreign aid relative to its national income.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received per Capita
description: In 2022, Grenada had a net ODA received per capita of -$800.94, indicating a significant outflow of aid per person compared to what was received.

title: Lowest Net ODA Received Relative to Imports
description: Grenada's net ODA received was -10.49% of its imports of goods, services, and primary income in 2022, suggesting a net outflow of aid relative to its import activities.

title: Minimal Grants Received
description: In 2022, Grenada received $1,860,000 in grants, excluding technical cooperation, reflecting a low level of grant funding compared to other nations.
